archimate:Assessment.name: Number of successful crisis rehearsals
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Counts the number of tests where the crisis management plan was executed as intended and objectives were met.
Criteria for what defines success needs to be clarified, such as completion of all steps within a certain timeframe, effective coordination between departments.
Jiri Paloch: What's most important is that the rehearsals take place. What is successful or not will vary a lot and challenging to capture.
